full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 135 of 228 811 LC2VMAX4 Alessi - Direct

1 MS. COMEY: Yes, your Honor.
2 A. Where it says household -- household --
3 Q. Hold on one second, Mr. Alessi.
4 MS. COMEY: May I approach, your Honor?
5 THE COURT: You may. Thank you.
6 You may proceed.
7 Q. Mr. Alessi, would you flip through this exhibit and tell us about how many pages long it is.
8 A. It's 58 pages.
9 Q. And have you looked through this before coming here to testify today?
10 A. Yes, I did.
11 Q. Do you recognize it?
12 A. Yes.
13 Q. What does it appear to be?
14 A. Well, this is all the instructions that we're supposed to -- that I was supposed to follow up to maintain the house.
15 Q. And Mr. Alessi, does this appear to be a version of the booklet that you were just testifying about?
16 A. Yes.
17 Q. Now, I want you to look at the date at the bottom left of each page.
18 A. Yes.
19 Q. Is that date before or after you left Mr. Epstein's employment?
20
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300

DOJ-OGR-00012420
